entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Fort Albany
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:13 p.m. EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of rain beginning near noon. Risk of freezing rain. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High zero. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to a few flurries and ice pellets and ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
